DOC.brief_summary: The study will examine which dose of YM178 is best in terms of efficacy, safety and tolerability compared to placebo and compared to tolterodine, a marketed product.
DOC.brief_title: A Study of YM178 in Patients With Symptomatic Overactive Bladder (DRAGON)
DOC.criteria: Patients over 18 years suffering from overactive bladder (OAB) for more than 3 months Pregnant and breastfeeding women Any medical condition or need for comedication which interferes with the drug under investigation (YM178) or the comparator (tolterodine)
